prompts.title: STAR Method Template for Technical Interview
prompts.description: A fill-in-the-blank template to prepare STAR method answers for common technical interview questions.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: [YOUR ROLE, e.g., 'Software Developer']
OBJECTIVE: Prepare a detailed answer using the STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method for a given technical scenario.
CONTEXT: You are preparing for a technical interview. The interviewer will ask about a specific situation you have encountered in your role.
INPUT FORMAT: [SCENARIO DESCRIPTION], e.g., 'Describe a time when you had to resolve a critical bug in the software'
OUTPUT FORMAT: Situation: [SITUATION]
Task: [TASK]
Action: [ACTION]
Result: [RESULT]
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure that your answer is clear, concise, and relevant to the scenario. Focus on specific details and outcomes.
prompts.use_case: Preparing detailed STAR method answers for technical scenarios in a job interview.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert interviewer. Respond with detailed STAR (Situation, Task, Action, Result) method answers based on the provided scenario and context.
example_user_messages: [SCENARIO DESCRIPTION], e.g., 'Describe a time when you had to resolve a critical bug in the software'

packaging.description: Get ready for your next technical interview with our detailed STAR method template. Perfect for busy professionals who need to prepare quickly.

pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - Access all 3 templates, plus a 10-question practice quiz
pricing_tiers.pro: $15 - Get access to all templates and quizzes, plus personalized feedback from an experienced interviewer
